import React, { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import { gsap, Power3 } from "gsap/dist/gsap"; import { ScrollTrigger } from "gsap/dist/ScrollTrigger"; import Layout from "../../../components/Layout"; import styles from "./ProjectItem.module.scss"; gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger); const ProjectItem = ({ heroImage, title, role, challenges, technos, linkToSeeLive, imageOne, imageTwo, imageThree, tabletImageOne, tabletImageTwo, tabletImageThree, mobileImageOne, mobileImageTwo, mobileImageThree }) => { let heroTitle = useRef(null); let image = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { gsap.from(heroTitle, 1.1, { y: 200, ease: "back" }, 5); gsap.from(image, 1, { y: -400, width: 0, }) }) return (
(image = el)} />

(heroTitle = el)}>{title}

Role :

{role}

Challenges

{challenges}

Technos :

{technos}

See live

DESKTOP

TABLET

MOBILE

Previous Project / next Project
 ); }; export default ProjectItem;
